commands.name: az mobile-network site create
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network site create --mobile-network-name
                              --name
                              --resource-group
                              [--location]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--tags]
examples: az mobile-network site create --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -n site-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network site delete
commands.summary: Delete the specified mobile network site.
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network site delete [--ids]
                              [--mobile-network-name]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--yes]
examples: az mobile-network site delete --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -n site-name -g rg -y'

commands.name: az mobile-network site list
commands.summary: List all sites in the mobile network.
examples: az mobile-network site list --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network site show
commands.summary: Get information about the specified mobile network site.
examples: az mobile-network site show--mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -n site-name -g rg

commands.name: az mobile-network site update
commands.syntax:
az mobile-network site update [--add]
                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--ids]
                              [--mobile-network-name]
                              [--name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--remove]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--set]
                              [--subscription]
                              [--tags]
examples: az mobile-network site update --mobile-network-name mobile-network-name -n site-name -g rg --tags "{tag:test,tag2:test2}"

commands.name: az mobile-network site wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
